mapper.select: select ch.*, c.id c_id, c.name c_name, c.amount c_amount, c.min_point c_min_point, c.platform c_platform, c.start_time c_start_time, c.end_time c_end_time, c.note c_note, c.use_type c_use_type, c.type c_type, pr.id pr_id,pr.product_id pr_product_id, pcr.id pcr_id,pcr.product_category_id pcr_product_category_id from `sms_coupon_history` ch left join `sms_coupon` c on ch.coupon_id = c.id left join `sms_coupon_product_relation` pr on pr.coupon_id = c.id left join `sms_coupon_product_category_relation` pcr on pcr.coupon_id = c.id where ch.member_id = #{id} and ch.use_status = 0
